sentence.Network_en: Your feet are rosy - red with the glow of my heart's desire, Gleaner of my sunset songs!

means.word_mean: 1. someone who picks up grain left in the field by the harvesters
2. someone who gathers something in small pieces (e.g. information) slowly and carefully
